main event: An unidentified flying object was reported at Little Rock AFB, Arkansas in December 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as narrow like a cigar and approximately twenty to thirty feet long., The sighting lasted for about 2-3 seconds., The object emitted a bright white light with a red light at the rear., The observer mentioned clear weather conditions with good visibility., Witnesses at nearby locations also reported seeing a similar light in the sky.
witness description: George M. Yancy, military personnel, reliability unknown
